name: Christmas puzzle (itch) (J3X)
description:
Very small puzzle prototype made in Unreal Engine and C++.

Features

  • Endless supply of random generated puzzles.
  • Tracks which level you are on and total number of moves

Gameplay

  • Use mouse to change all blocks into the same color.
  • Hold down one one block and slide to the next one either vertical or horizontal. Entire row or column will switch color.
